fields.body:
Hello {{ recipient_name }},

{{ sender_name }} has shared a data set with you via the Duke Data Service. Please click the link below to preview the data set.

Description: {{ project_name }}
Preview URL: {{ project_url }}

After you have reviewed the data set, contact {{ sender_email }} or reply to this message to request a finalized copy.

Regards,

Computational Solutions
Duke Center for Genomic and Computational Biology
gcb-help@duke.edu
http://www.genome.duke.edu/cores-and-services/computational-solutions
fields.subject: Duke Data Service share for {{ project_name }}

fields.body:
Hello {{ recipient_name }},

{{ sender_name }} has sent you a data set via the Duke Data Service. Please click the link below to accept or decline the data set.

Description: {{ project_name }}
Acceptance URL: {{ accept_url }}

Regards,

Computational Solutions
Duke Center for Genomic and Computational Biology
gcb-help@duke.edu
http://www.genome.duke.edu/cores-and-services/computational-solutions
fields.subject: Duke Data Service delivery for {{ project_name }}

fields.body:
Hello {{ sender_name }},

{{ recipient_name }} has {{ type }} project {{ project_name }}.

{{ message }}

{% if warning_message %}{{ warning_message }}

{% endif %}Regards,

Computational Solutions
Duke Center for Genomic and Computational Biology
gcb-help@duke.edu
http://www.genome.duke.edu/cores-and-services/computational-solutions

fields.subject: Duke Data Service Decline for {{ project_name }}

fields.body:
Hello {{ recipient_name }},

{{ sender_name }} has shared a data set with you via the Duke Data Service. Please click the link below to preview the data set. 


Description: {{ project_name }}
Preview URL: {{ project_url }}

Only the file metadata is visible at this time. Please contact us at {{ sender_email }} to schedule a data review appointment, at which time you will be granted download access and ultimately data ownership.

Regards,

Computational Solutions
Duke Center for Genomic and Computational Biology
gcb-help@duke.edu
http://www.genome.duke.edu/cores-and-services/computational-solutions
fields.subject: Duke Data Service preview for {{ project_name }}
